text: The Palestine Solidarity Campaign (PSC) is an activist organisation in England and Wales. It supports the Palestinian people. It was founded in 1982 during the build-up to Israel's invasion of Lebanon. It was incorporated in the UK in 2004 as Palestine Solidarity Campaign Ltd. ==References== Category:1982 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:Arabâ€“Israeli conflict Category:Political organisations in the United Kingdom
title: Palestine Solidarity Campaign
